text: 20:12 Daniel 12:1; Matyu 16:27; 25:31-46; Aposel 17:31; Rom 2:6; 2 Korin 5:10; Filipai 4:3; Akar Mogomem 13:8; 19:5Ezɨ kɨ gumazamizir ovengezir ziaba itiba ko ziaba puvatɨzibar gari, me bar iti. Me atrivir dabirabimɨn guamɨn tuivighav iti, ezɨ akɨnafarir gumazamizibar araziba itiba kuiaghire. Ezɨ me akɨnafarir igharazim uaghan akui, kar akɨnafarir God gumazamizir ikɨrɨmɨrir zurara itim iniamin ziaba osirizim. Ezɨ gumazir atrivir dabirabir kam gaperazim, akar akɨnafarir kabar itibar gara gumazamizir ovengezibar araziba tuisɨsi.
